body:
- Fix overloaded env dest in argparse
- Fix tests

Should fix the tests on python 3.9.x.

It's a bug on our side, but I guess we relied on this bug in python: https://github.com/python/cpython/commit/a18d52269ab6071a605d6c72f6af585a4c533ca4

Note that this PR removes the unused argument in `spack env loads [env]` since that uses the active env only
title: Fix overloaded argparse keys
